name: @paretoman/votekit
description: An explorable sandbox that shows how different voting methods work using a spatial opinion model.

scripts.build: npm run build2 && npm run copy0 && npm run copy1 && npm run copy2
scripts.publish-docs: cd docs && git add . && git commit && git push -u
scripts.jekyll: cd src/demo && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.site: npm run copy5 && npm run parcel-build-3 && npm run jekyll
scripts.site:local: npm run copy5 && npm run parcel-build-3 && npm run jekyll:local
scripts.jekyll:local: cd src/demo && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_local.yml
scripts.clean: rimraf dist docs src/demo/tutorial src/demo/docs src/demo/_site src/demo/_site_local src/demo/dist
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run site && npm run jekyll:local
scripts.push-site-prep: cd src/demo/_site && git init && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m localPush && git remote add origin https://github.com/paretoman/votekit.git && git status
scripts.push-site: cd src/demo/_site && git push -u origin gh-pages -f
scripts.patch: npm version patch --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m versionPatch && npm version patch
scripts.all-after-build: npm run push-site-prep && npm run push-site && npm run patch && npm run push-main && npm run publish
scripts.all: npm run build-all && npm run all-after-build
